mapper.update: update companion set finished_at = sysdate where companion_id = #{companionId} and finished_at is null
mapper.select: select c.companion_id, r.post_title, r.match_branch, r.match_date, f.member_id first_member_id, f.nickname first_member_nickname, s.member_id second_member_id, s.nickname second_member_nickname from companion c join chat_room r on c.chat_room_id = r.chat_room_id join member f on c.first_member_id = f.member_id join member s on c.second_member_id = s.member_id where c.companion_id = #{companionId}
